alert.note: Alert for Bollinger; Carter; Wayne (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 12:58AM CDT until August 03 at 1:45AM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Bollinger County in southeastern Missouri... Northern Carter County in southeastern Missouri... Wayne County in southeastern Missouri... * Until 145 AM CDT. * At 1258 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Saco to near Piedmont to 9 miles northeast of Winona, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Piedmont, Van Buren, Greenville, Lake Wappapello State Park, Sam A. Baker State Park, Williamsville, Shook, Lodi, Cascade, Grassy, Mill Spring and Zalma. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
